Amazon #1 bestselling author, Diana Peterson-More, labor lawyer & HR head left a Fortune 50 to launch a leadership consulting LLC, focusing on people strategies, services & products to support strategic goals. She's a blogger, guest columnist & presenter, featured in CEO Magazine, & on podcasts. New book "' Can we all just get along, Rodney King - Courageous Communication: A Return to Civility" goes live in June '24. BA, UCLA & JD, Loyola Law School.

name: Author
value: One Amazon #1 bestseller & a second set to publish on June 1. Topic: communication in these perilous times.
